lines: Ah, youse must be the new kid on the block.
Name’s Liss. Me does the fixins and the hammersies.
No touchings. Ain’t got time to reattach fingies.
Oh. Youse again.
Somethin’ broke, or are youse just feeling the boredoms?
Smithin’s in me bloodses. Me grandpappy been swingin’ hammersies since ’fore Pebblewick had street signs.
Same with me ma. And her ma. So now it’s me. And me’s pretty damn good at it, if me says so meself.
It’s okay work, me supposes. Loud. Hot. Strong. But never been what gets me tickin’, y’know?
Still, me sticks with it. You don’t say no to me family. Not if you likes keepin’ your teethses.
Speakings of hot thingses… That Tia. She got a way with fire.
Me was thinkin’ of makin’ somethin’ for her. Nothin’ big. Just somethin’ nice.
But me don’t know what she likeses. You could… maybe… ask ’round, yeah? See what sparkses her fancy?
Eh? Somethin’ wrong with how me talkses?
This me normal voice. Got passed down like me anvil.
All mousefolk talk like this, they does. Grandpappy used to say, ‘Big wordses for cowards an’ showoffs.’
Me talks how me was raised. Besides—me words get the job done. You understoods me, didn’t ya?
Pebblewick’s been me home me whole life. Same for me ma. And her ma.
The air here’s good for metal—holds the heatses just right.
Folks here? Hm. You got Clay, who don’t say much… and Filbert, who says way too much.
But mosts are good people. It’s a place worth makin’ things for.
You want them wood bits? Go ahead. They’s just leftover stuffs.
A star map, huh? Yeah… me’s heard her speak of Shen before.
Quiet-like. Soft voice. Real sad, like she’s holdin’ fire in her belly but don’t wanna burn no one.
But me didn’t knows ’bout the starses. Sky-flames… A nice word, that is.
Me thinks… me knows what to makes now. Somethin’ quiet. Somethin’ gentle.
But… Me don’t knows if me can do it…
Me was thinkin’ of… embroiderin’ somethin’. Don’t tells no one, yeah?
But… me loves the art of the thread. It’s soft. Quiet. Me hands get real still when me does it.
But if me family knew… Me dreads to imagineses. They’d say it ain’t proper work. Ain’t strong. Ain’t worth nothin’.
That’s why… that’s why me don’t knows if me can do it.
Me don’t thinks… Me can brings meself…
All rights… You got through to me.
Me’s gonna make this gift so stunnin’, Tia won’t knows what hit her!
Thankses to you, friend… truly.
Tia’s… somethin’ else, ain’t she?
All calm and clever—like a fire that don’t burn, just warmses you.
Me’s been watchin’ her for a while now. Didn’t thinks me had a shot—figured she’d laugh if she knew.
But… you helped work up the nerveses, helped me say what me couldn’t say with wordses.
Maybe… maybe she sees me, too.
Me hopes she does.
Huh? Lookin’ for Pip’s recipe, are ya?
Oh, whiskers... Yeah, it’s in theres.
But she don’t gets it back. She tormented me family, she did. Terrible prankses. For years.
We was already strugglin’, and she made it worse.
I know she was just a little goblin back then, but still—she never said sorries.
Never even told you what she did, did she?
Look… If she comes ’round and apologises proper, maybe—maybe—me thinks on givin’ it back.
Oh, it’s you!
Me likes when it’s you.
Don’t tell nobody, but… me thinks you’re alright.
Me made somethin’ real, thanks to you. Real as heartses.
